description: Not a prime and average of divisors is an integer.
comments: Composite numbers n such that sigma(n)==0 mod tau(n). [_Paolo P. Lava_, Jun 11 2013]
links: Paolo P. Lava, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1000
maple: with(numtheory); ListA023883:=proc(q) local n;for n from 1 to q do if not isprime(n) then  if  sigma(n) mod tau(n)=0 thenprint(n); fi; fi; od;  end: ListA023883(10^6); # _Paolo P. Lava_, Jun 11 2013
